author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member's city council's Futures Committee is looking for communities who have revamped their traditional board and commissions (28 in their case) toward a more innovative, progressive,civic engagement process.
Please share your efforts in redesigning your board and commissions to be more innovative and progressive civic engagement boards/commissions.
Thank you!
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Innovative/Progressive Boards & Commissions
